name: Space Tunes
description:
Space Tunes is an application designed to help people learn and visualize music in a new way: puzzles and constellations! Our music language is simple: the colors of the rainbow. Each color represents a note and, as the levels progress, the relationship between color and sound becomes more and more apparent. This way, the user stays visually engaged, as opposed to reading sheet music, and is encouraged to keep learning.

Developed by Helena Ruiz and Jaime Cantú for HACKMIT2020.
